query_1_top5_with_opening_odds.sql: SELECT league_id, COUNT(*) AS with_opening FROM matches WHERE league_id IN (39,140,135,78,61) AND opening_odds_home IS NOT NULL GROUP BY league_id ORDER BY league_id

query_2_outside_top5.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE league_id NOT IN (39,140,135,78,61) AND opening_odds_home IS NOT NULL
query_2_outside_top5.note: Pre-existing data from other leagues (LATAM Pack1, etc.) - NOT touched by FDUK backfill
